text: Zinthia de los Ángeles Benavides Hernández (born 31 December 1969) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. In 2003 she served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Nuevo León. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Nuevo León Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians
title: Zinthia Benavides
